name: Not Pixel
description: Telegram gaming platform Notcoin announced Thursday it will launch a pixel art competition within the Not Pixel game, with the tournament pitting 1,024 online communities against each other in a battle for digital canvas supremacy. Not Pixel is a tap-to-earn blockchain-based game developed by the creators of Notcoin. It allows players to engage in a digital canvas where they can mine colors and create pixel art, earning points known as PX. These points can later be converted into cryptocurrency.
